jobs.title: GTM Engineer, Altitude
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Squads

Squads is a financial technology company building products and APIs for the stablecoin economy. We build on open infrastructure, global money and internet capital markets to deliver better financial services to every business, individual and developer.

Our Products

  • Squads Multisig: The premier multisig platform for Solana.

  • Altitude: A global business account to save, earn and move money.

  • Fuse: A personal finance app for stablecoins and tokenized assets.

These three products are powered by our stablecoin infrastructure and developer platform: Grid.

Our investors include Haun Ventures, Multicoin Capital, Electric Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Toly, Mert, and others.

Altitude is our self-custodial business account for global companies. It offers USD/EUR accounts with routing numbers and IBANs, rewards, batch payments, corporate cards, expense management and more. Altitude merges fintech and stablecoin infrastructure to deliver premium financial services built for a future that’s global by default and powered by autonomous finance.

About the Role

We’re looking for a GTM Engineer to help us hack traction from the ground up. This isn’t a “growth ops” role — it’s engineering distribution in true crypto style: scrappy, fast, global.

What you will be doing

  • Build scrappy automations, tools, and workflows to supercharge distribution

  • Hack channels like Reddit, Amazon, Shopify, Etsy, Twitter/X — wherever founders hang out

  • Partner with marketing to turn wild ideas into working systems

  • Find creative, technical ways to get Altitude in front of the right people

  • Use AI (ChatGPT, Claude, Grok, Gemini) + code to experiment at speed

Qualifications

  • Doing another job but bored and hacking on side projects

  • Maybe you dropped out of MIT, Stanford, or Waterloo

  • A technical growth hacker — part engineer, part marketer, full degen builder

  • Obsessed with traction — shipping experiments > pitching decks

Why Squads

  • Build the future of open finance. You’ll help accelerate adoption of stablecoin‑powered solutions at a time when finance is shifting to programmable, borderless rails

  • Broaden your impact. Drive alignment, innovation, and results across teams and initiatives.

  • Modern tools and culture. Operate with high agency in a mission‑driven team that ships relentlessly and values craftsmanship.

  • Mission Focus. We don't hire people that need to be managed, we hire people that want to be led

Benefits

  • We’re offering competitive and generous compensation, with meaningful equity and upside.

  • Unlimited, flexible PTO

  • Flexible work schedule

  • Company laptop and allowance for any necessary home equipment

  • Two company-paid off-sites per year

Our Values

  • Kindness Matters. We show kindness and respect to all users, customers, and team members in every interaction (internal and external). Being kind compounds and strengthens our relationships.

  • Craftsmanship Excellence. We deeply care about the quality of everything we create. Every contribution, regardless of size, must meet our high standards for excellence.

  • Radical Transparency. We communicate openly and honestly with each other. Respectful candor is valued over comfortable silence, as we can't afford to miss insights due to fear of speaking up.

  • Bias for Action. We believe action produces information. At no more than 20% completion of a project we must have a working prototype to test and iterate on.

  • Speed with Purpose. We move with urgency and focus. Slow and expensive usually go together. Good, fast, and cheap outcomes are perfectly achievable through disciplined execution.

  • Professional Integrity. We never speak negatively about competitors, partners, vendors, or others. Such behavior reflects insecurity and provides no value.

  • Creative Problem-Solving. We value innovative thinking that challenges conventions. The best solution aligns with the task at hand, not necessarily with how things have always been done.

  • Team Over Ego. We share both successes and failures collectively. No individual's ego should surpass our commitment to the product and its impact.

  • Results Over Hierarchy. We do not care about titles in this company. No politics, no hierarchy. All we care about is winning together.

If you’re excited to help businesses access modern money rails and believe that stablecoins will democratize finance, we’d love to talk. Reach out to us

jobs.title: Product Marketing Manager, Altitude
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Squads

Squads is building the financial stack for the stablecoin economy. We develop products and APIs that let businesses, individuals, and developers access better financial services, built on open infrastructure, global money, and internet capital markets.

Our ecosystem includes:

  • Squads Multisig: The leading multisig platform on Solana

  • Altitude: A global business account to save, earn, and move money

  • Fuse: A personal finance app for stablecoins and tokenized assets

  • Grid: The stablecoin infrastructure and developer platform powering it all

Our investors include Haun Ventures, Multicoin Capital, Electric Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Toly, Mert, and others.

About Altitude

Altitude is a self-custodial business account for global companies. It offers USD/EUR accounts with routing numbers and IBANs, stablecoin yield, batch payments, corporate cards, and expense management — all powered by onchain infrastructure. It merges fintech and stablecoins to deliver premium, programmable financial services for a world that’s global by default.

About the Role

We’re looking for a Product Marketing Manager to own and scale Altitude’s narrative across product, content, and growth.


This role sits at the intersection of storytelling, go-to-market, and product strategy. You’ll translate complex infrastructure into a clear, aspirational brand that founders and finance teams love.

What You’ll Do

  • Own Altitude’s GTM narrative — craft positioning, messaging, and campaigns that define the category of self-custodial business banking.

  • Drive launches and growth — partner with product and design to turn features into stories that drive adoption and revenue.

  • Create best-in-class content — from product explainers and thought pieces to landing pages, decks, and social threads.

  • Shape the customer journey — ensure consistent storytelling across every touchpoint (site, app, socials, PR, onboarding).

  • Use AI and design tools — leverage ChatGPT, Midjourney, Figma, and Notion to move fast and ship beautiful work.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally — work closely with founders, engineers, and designers to ensure clarity and alignment.

What We’re Looking For

  • 4+ years in product marketing, fintech, SaaS, or crypto

  • Strong writing instincts — you think in narratives, not just campaigns

  • Proven ability to distill technical products into crisp, emotional messaging

  • Experience leading GTM launches and collaborating across product and growth

  • Comfortable using AI tools to ideate, write, and design faster

  • Curious about stablecoins, programmable money, and the future of finance

Why Squads

  • Build the future of open finance. You’ll help define how businesses access stablecoin-powered financial services.

  • Shape the voice of a category. Altitude sits at the frontier of fintech and crypto — you’ll set its narrative and scale its reach.

  • Operate with high agency. We’re a small, mission-driven team that ships relentlessly and values craft over noise.

  • Mission Focus. We don't hire people that need to be managed, we hire people that want to be led

Benefits

  • Competitive compensation and meaningful equity

  • Unlimited flexible PTO

  • Remote-first culture and flexible schedule

  • Company laptop and home office allowance

  • Two company off-sites per year

Our Values

Kindness Matters • Craftsmanship Excellence • Radical Transparency • Bias for Action • Speed with Purpose • Team Over Ego • Results Over Hierarchy

Come help us build the voice of Altitude — and define the future of stablecoin finance.
